Title: Exsuscito
Writer: David Hollander, William Wheeler, Ann Biderman (created by), Gina Welch (staff writer), Lenore Zion (staff writer)
Actors: Liev Schreiber, Paula Malcomson, Eddie Marsan, Dash Mihok
Plot: Ray's troubles continue as he learns about Bridget and her math teacher. Mickey makes things worse as usual trying to take on the APS alone. Theresa has a surprise for Bunchy.
